name: Disaster's Right Hand
description:
Only the echoes of pain remain on the devastated earth â€” the march of the end times.
Disaster's Right Hand is adept at drawing upon Imaginary power to create large-scale attacks.

skills.name: Calamity Tear
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Tough Cuts
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets, and randomly inflicts Imaginary Infusion on 2 targets.

skills.name: The Breakdown of Tyranny
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets, and randomly inflicts Imaginary Infusion on 3 targets.

skills.name: Ruinous Collision
skills.description: When this unit uses their ability and causes a target to be in Quantum Infusion and Imaginary Infusion at the same time, dispels both Quantum Infusion and Imaginary Infusion on the target, and deals minor Quantum DMG and Imaginary DMG with a high chance of inflicting <u>Snarelock</u> to the target.

skills.name: Feigned Death
skills.description: After suffering a killing blow, enters Feigned Death.

skills.name: Safeguard
skills.description: Enters the Safeguard state. When not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.
